level.text: Contracting Officers may appoint in writing a Contracting Officer’s Technical Representative (“COTR”) to provide such management oversight and technical direction for a particular procurement or contract as the Contracting Officer shall determine is necessary or useful.
The COTR shall maintain an arm’s length relationship with the contractor. COTRs have no authority to modify any contract.
